        <api_name>sn_sow.SOWPolarisLandingPageTileProvider_Default</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point sn_sow.PolarisLandingPageTileProvider</description>
        <name>SOWPolarisLandingPageTileProvider_Default</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SOWPolarisLandingPageTileProvider_Default = Class.create();
SOWPolarisLandingPageTileProvider_Default.prototype = {
    type: 'SOWPolarisLandingPageTileProvider_Default',
    initialize: function() {},
    _getTile: function(order, navigationDelay, userGreeting, navigationMessage, icon, heading, description, url) {
        var forceNavigationNode = {
            navigationDelay: navigationDelay,
            navigationMessage: navigationMessage
        };
        // forceNavigationNode.userGreeting = userGreeting;
        return {
            order: order,
            forceNavigation: forceNavigationNode,
            icon: icon,
            heading: {
                label: heading,
                size: 'md'
            },
            description: description,
            event: {
                name: 'NAV_ITEM_SELECTED',
                payload: {
                    external: {
                        url: url,
                        target: '_self'
                    }
                }
            }
        };
    },
    process: function(request) {

        // Constants
        var ORDER = 1000;
        var DELAY = 1000;
        var NAV_GREETING = gs.getMessage('Welcome {0}', gs.getUser().getDisplayName());
        var NAV_MSG = gs.getMessage('We\'ll be landing at your destination shortly...');
        var ICON = null;

        // Tiles
        var items = [];

        // Check groups
        var serviceDeskGroupsProperty = gs.getProperty('sn_sow.service_desk_groups', 'd625dccec0a8016700a222a0f7900d06');
        var serviceDeskGroups = serviceDeskGroupsProperty.split(',');
        var isMemberOfServiceDesk = false;
        for (var i in serviceDeskGroups) {
            var group = serviceDeskGroups[i].trim();
            if (gs.getUser().isMemberOf(group)) {
                isMemberOfServiceDesk = true;
                break;
            }
        }

        // Decide which tiles to send
        if (gs.hasRole('admin') || gs.hasRole('maint')) {
            // Decision is if maint or admin land on dashboards page as current Polaris implementation has order 99 for admin so
            // we cannot insert ourselves in the middle AND we can't access specific variants AND there is not solution specifically
            // for maint
            var DASHBOARD_OVERVIEW_PAGE = '%24pa_dashboards_overview.do';
            var adminHeading = gs.getMessage('Dashboards');
            var adminDescription = gs.getMessage('Go to Dashboards');
            var adminPath = DASHBOARD_OVERVIEW_PAGE;
            var adminUrl = 'nav_to.do?uri=' + adminPath;
            var adminTile = this._getTile(ORDER, DELAY, NAV_GREETING, NAV_MSG, ICON, adminHeading, adminDescription, adminUrl);
            items.push(adminTile);
        } else if (isMemberOfServiceDesk) {
            var sowHeading = gs.getMessage('Service Operations Workspace');
            var sowDescription = gs.getMessage('Go to Service Operations Workspace');
            var sowUrl = '/now/sow';
            var sowTile = this._getTile(ORDER, DELAY, NAV_GREETING, NAV_MSG, ICON, sowHeading, sowDescription, sowUrl);
            items.push(sowTile);
        } else { // Is not service desk user but is itil
            var DEFAULT_LANDING_PAGE = '%24pa_dashboard.do';
            var landingPage = gs.getProperty('sn_sow.default_landing_page', DEFAULT_LANDING_PAGE);
            var classicHeading = gs.getMessage('Dashboard');
            var classicDescription = gs.getMessage('Go to Dashboard');
            var classicPath = landingPage;
            var classicUrl = 'nav_to.do?uri=' + classicPath;
            var classicTile = this._getTile(ORDER, DELAY, NAV_GREETING, NAV_MSG, ICON, classicHeading, classicDescription, classicUrl);
            items.push(classicTile);
        }
        return items;
    }
};]]></script>
